title: Bexters Soda Crystals 200g
features: 100% natural product mined in Australia and filtered and refined through unique heat processing to maximize benefits
Naturally-occurring product that can help with muscle loosening, making it a great addition to your workout routine.
Also recommended by sport therapists for aching muscles and recovery after sports.
Small 200g sachet suitable for 2-3 applicator wraps or six baths; can also be used as a soak in foot spa or hand bowl to soften skin and ease aches.
description: Introducing Bexters Soda Crystals - the natural solution to aches. Our 100% natural product is mined in Australia and filtered and refined through a unique heat processing method to maximize its benefits. Bexters Soda Crystals are also used by sport therapists. Our fragrance-free product is perfect for treating swelling in joints or swollen feet/hands. Whether you're recovering after sports or just looking to loosen up your muscles before a race, Bexters Soda Crystals can help. Our environmentally friendly small 200g sachet is suitable for 2-3 applicator wraps or six baths. Simply use in a relaxing bath or with our purpose-designed applicator wrap for the best results. You can also use Bexters Soda Crystals as a soak in a foot spa or hand bowl to soften skin and ease aches.
